Beaverton.Columbia Sportswear: Columbia Sportswear Company is an American company that manufactures and distributes outerwear, sportswear, and footwear. It was founded in 1938 by Paul Lamfrom, father of present chairperson Gert Boyle. The company is headquartered in Cedar Mill, Oregon, an unincorporated part of Washington County, Oregon, in the Portland metropolitan area near Beaverton.
